install.description:
Text Scroller by Sakic.Net

Text Scroller displays and continuously scrolls through a selected article.
Featuring parameter options for size, autoplay, scrolling speed and pausing on mouse-over.

For scrolling through multiple articles, banners, RSS feeds and Twitter posts get AJAX Scroller - advanced slider with dynamic loading of unlimited number of items. No overhead, great performance and user friendliness. Check out the DEMO.

Visit http://www.sakic.net for more exciting Joomla extensions.

param.name: article_id
param.label: Article ID
param.description: ID of the article to scroll through

param.name: text_type
param.label: Text to display
param.description: Display article intro or full text or both

param.name: width
param.label: Module width
param.description: Module width in pixels or percents

param.name: time_down
param.label: Scroll time down
param.description: Time to scroll down, lower number for faster scrolling

param.name: time_up
param.label: Scroll time up (ms)
param.description: Time to scroll up, in milliseconds

param.name: pause_time
param.label: Pause time (ms)
param.description: Pause time between the scrolls, in milliseconds

param.name: mouseover_pause
param.label: Pause on mouse-over
param.description: Pause the scrolling on mouse over

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module class suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
